profile:
"Here at Scar Improvements we provide custom, quality glass work. With 7 years experience we make almost any design work.

Recently moved into the Wasaga Beach area in August 2021, but servicing all the nearby areas.

Our main focus is Shower Enclosures, Railings and Office Enclosures. We also install custom Mirror for bathrooms, or gym walls.

We use the highest quality hardware & silicone for our jobs.
Including a wide range of variety for coloured hardware to match majority of designs.

Mainly using 10mm Tempered Polished Glass for installs.
Glass has Bronze or Gray Tint options available, as well as colour painted options.

Free estimates and quotes with provided measurements of the opening."
services: Glass Installation (Showers, Mirror, Enclosures), Silicone, Glass Order & Delivery
name: Scar Improvements
